CustomField.formula:
CASE(Category_1__c, "CEO",((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(10/100)), "GM",((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(10/100)), "HOD",((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(10/100)), "Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(10/100)), "Asst Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(10/100)), ((( Subtotal_for_Part1__c /25 ) *100) *(15/100))
)
CustomField.label: weightage
